doc.title: In Search of Work: Episode One - WPM
doc.plot: An underemployed father of two looks deep into himself and his computer screen to solve the eternal question of how to provide for the family. With skill, and some improbable pluck, our hero struggles to better his administrative skills. Using an on-line Speed Test, he tries and tries, stumbling badly at first. With the sweet eyes of his kin looking on (not to mention their gentle intrusions to this practice), at last a new level of typing accomplishment shatters all doubt that this dad can succeed. The only question now is 'Where?'
